name: Lab Rat!
description:
Description

In this game jam entry, you play as a mouse in stages set up by studying scientists. You use multiple level assets to find your way through the stage, and eat the cheese. But, why are you doing these tests? How can you escape? Play the game and find what's going on behind the scenes...

Controls

WASD / arrow keys : Move the character (I suggest WASD)

Q : Zoom out to see more of the level

R : Reset the level

P : Close the game

IF THE GAME ISN'T FULLSCREEN,
TRY LOADING THE GAME AGAIN
